title: Vicious
description: Hell is for secrets.Don’t worry, I didn’t die. I’m not that easy to kill.Hades cured me with that little vial he poured down my throat, and now I’m stuck in the Underworld.At least I’ve got all my guys with me on this forced vacation. Greyson keeps freaking out, Apollo is set on pushing every single one of my personal boundaries, Hades just wants to keep me safe, and Pim finally breaks his silence.There’s just one problem crashing this honeymoon phase—Persephone doesn’t want us here, and she will stop at nothing to destroy me.It makes no sense, I did nothing to Hades’ ex.Except finally I discover just who I am, and all the pieces fall into place. Persephone has a very good reason to want me dead, after all.I know who I am.I know where I came from.And I’ve collected the sins of my heritage.The fate of a dragon leaves a Vicious Ache.***Welcome to the Fated Universe, where each series focuses on a different set of fated mates. By the end of each series, each couple will have their happily ever after. Reverse Harem Paranormal Romance.Not every loose end will be resolved in each universe at the end of each series. Some secrets will span across additional series but will in no way take away from the individual stories. You can still read each series out of order, but the suggested reading order is as follows:Fated Souls - SabinaSurrenderSubmissionSeductionSalvationSabinaFated Sight - VanessaVisionsViciousVanquishVengeanceA Fated World Standalone - KendallCerberusChaos Magic - PepperPsychotic - Halloween 2022PretentiousPompousPerversePerilous
author: Elle Lincoln
